amendment.description: An amendment numbered 129 printed in Part A of House Report 118-559 to reduce funding for Defense-Wide RDTE by $4,910,000 to defund DOD climate-change research and increase funding by $4,910,000 for Army RDTE to fund enhancements for Unmanned Ground Vehicles.
amendment.purpose: Amendment reduces the account for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide by $4,910,000 and increases the account for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (AL) amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 210 - 201 (Roll no. 326).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore (AL) amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 210 - 201 (Roll no. 326).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
